profile_classification.rationale: The job description focuses on traditional full-stack development, web application building, and data analysis using standard programming languages and frameworks. While it mentions working with data analysts and potentially leveraging technology for client transformation, it lacks any specific mention of AI, machine learning, generative models, or related advanced technologies. The core responsibilities and technologies listed align with general software development rather than specialized AI engineering roles.

job_tasks.justification: The description explicitly mentions 'building Software Solutions', 'build defined Software solutions', 'Building web applications', and working with technologies like Python (FastAPI, Django), Javascript (React), which are core to software development.
The role involves working in 'multidisciplinary teams' and 'Agile development teams', which are common practices in software development.
job_tasks.phrase: Working as part of Agile development teams

job_tasks.justification: Building web applications is a direct software development task.
Working on 'Data Analysis projects using Python' and SQL/NoSQL databases indicates involvement in data-related tasks, which can include aspects of data engineering.
job_tasks.phrase: work on Data Analysis projects using Python

job_tasks.justification: Learning and using 'Git for version control' is a fundamental practice in software development and operations for managing code.
job_tasks.phrase: Learning and using Git for version control

job_tasks.justification: The role requires learning 'Business / Accounting / Finance concepts expected of the Project / Product', indicating a need to understand the business context.
job_tasks.phrase: learn the Business / Accounting / Finance concepts

job_tasks.justification: The mention of 'Coaching colleagues in the areas of personal growth and development' implies communication and mentoring skills.
job_tasks.phrase: Coaching colleagues in the areas of personal growth and development

job_tasks.justification: The requirement to 'complete the onboarding training of the team (Technical & Non-Technical) on time' and the general context of working on transformation projects implies a need for continuous learning.
job_tasks.phrase: complete the onboarding training of the team (Technical & Non-Technical) on time

soft_skills.phrase: Coaching colleagues in the areas of personal growth and development
continuously invest globally in the development of our team members, our skills
complete the onboarding training of the team (Technical & Non-Technical) on time
